Entries.SamPrankSeb: hey {{Lowercase:{{PlayerName}}}}!!!!^^emergency meeting at the saloon later tonight, need to talk to you ASAP!!!!!^^  - sam^^p.s. don't worry it's gonna be super fun +^p.p.s. DON'T tell sebastian[#]Emergency Meeting
Entries.AbbyPrankSeb: Hey, @!^^Today's the day! Meet you at my place this afternoon. Don't forget the "stuff"!^^  -Abby[#]Abby's Reminder

Entries.505400001/f Sebastian 2000/f Abigail 200: poppy/-2000 -2000/farmer 23 19 1 Abigail 42 17 2 Sam 40 19 2/skippable/showFrame Abigail 23/viewport 34 19/move farmer 15 0 1 true/pause 1500/stopAnimation Abigail/jump Abigail/move Abigail 0 1 3 true/speak Abigail "Hey, there you are!"/pause 100/faceDirection Sam 3/pause 200/speak Sam "@! Come on in.$h"/move Abigail -3 0 2 true/pause 1000/speak Sam "Okay, I'll cut right to the chase. Sebastian's birthday is coming up soon, and we wanna do something to surprise him."/pause 200/speak Abigail "Obviously, we have to mess with him.#$b#The opportunity's too good to miss!$h"/pause 200/speak Sam "He's gonna freak. But like, in a good way.$3"/speak Abigail "Yeah! We thought you'd wanna get in on the action. We even got Maru to help out."/pause 200/speak Sam "So, do you wanna prank Seb on his birthday with us?"/question fork1 "#I'm in!#I'd rather not..."/pause 200/fork noPrankSeb/jump Abigail/jump Sam/pause 100/speak Sam "Sweet! This is gonna be great.$h"/pause 200/speak Abigail "We know you're one of the best fishers in town, so we were hoping that you'd be able to get us some tuna."/speak Sam "Not just *some* tuna! A ton of it!$h"/pause 100/speak Abigail "Just bring it to my place on Seb's birthday, and we'll handle the rest."/addQuest 505401/addMailReceived yesPrankSeb/speak Sam "Man, I'm so pumped for this!$h"/emote Sam 56/pause 400/speak Abigail "I can't wait to see the look on Seb's face.$h"/pause 200/speak Abigail "You know, we should celebrate our plan. Dinner's on me!$h"/pause 500/move Abigail -8 0 2 true/textAboveHead Abigail "Hey, Gus!"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/farmerEat 242/message "Whew! Looks like I've got some fish to catch."/pause 500/end dialogue Sam "I'm so glad you're down with our plan, @. This is gonna be so much fun.$3"
Entries.noPrankSeb: textAboveHead Sam "Oh."/textAboveHead Abigail "Oh."/pause 1500/speak Sam "Okay, @...$s#$b#Well, thanks for meeting up with us anyway."/pause 200/emote Sam 40/emote Abigail 40/emote farmer 40/pause 1000/speak Abigail "Well, we're all here... we may as well order some food."/move Abigail -8 0 2 true/textAboveHead Abigail "Hey, Gus!"/pause 1000/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/farmerEat 236/message "It was kind of awkward at first, but the three of us still had a good time at dinner."/pause 1000/end dialogue Abigail "Hey, don't tell Sebastian about what happened tonight, okay?"

Entries.505401: Basic/Seb's Birthday Surprise/Sam and Abby are planning to prank Sebastian on his birthday. They want you to bring them a fresh tuna./Bring a Tuna to Abigail's house on Sebastian's birthday./-1/-1/0/-1/true

Entries.505400003/i 130/z spring/z summer/z fall: poppy/8 5/farmer 13 12 0 Abigail 3 6 0 Sam 1000 1000 1 Sebastian 999 999 1 Maru 998 998 1/skippable/removeQuest 505401/removeItem 130/friendship Sebastian 100/pause 1000/doAction 13 11/move farmer 0 -6 3 true/pause 500/jump Abigail/faceDirection Abigail 1/pause 100/textAboveHead Abigail "Hey, {{PlayerName}}!"/move farmer -8 0 3/speak Abigail "Sam's on his way with some more supplies.#$b#Do you have the tuna?"/pause 500/addObject 4 6 130/playSound fishSlap/pause 500/jump Abigail/pause 100/textAboveHead Abigail "Woah, that thing's huge!"/pause 2000/speed Abigail 5/move Abigail 0 -1 1/speed Abigail 5/move Abigail 1 0 2/warp Sam 13 12 0/faceDirection Sam 0/textAboveHead Abigail "Hmmm..."/showFrame Abigail 24/pause 500/showFrame Abigail 25/pause 1500/showFrame Abigail 0/stopAnimation Abigail/speak Abigail "I don't know much about fish, but this looks great!$h"/stopAnimation Abigail/speed Sam 5/move Sam 0 -5 3 true/pause 1000/speak Sam "Hey guys, I have a knife!$h"/speed Sam 4/move Sam -10 0 0 true/jump farmer/faceDirection farmer 2/showFrame farmer 94/emote farmer 16/animate Abigail false true 100 28 29/pause 1000/stopAnimation farmer/faceDirection farmer 3 true/move Sam 0 -1 1/speak Abigail "Don't worry, @!$h#$b#Sam knows what he's doing. I think."/stopAnimation Abigail/speak Sam "Yeah, I watched a video tutorial.$3#$b#Why don't you just sit back and relax? You already did your part, so now it's our turn."/speak Abigail "Come on, let's get this done."/stopMusic/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/playSound eat/pause 200/playSound crafting/pause 200/playSound fishSlap/speak Sam "Hey, can you pass me that plate?"/playSound slimedead/pause 200/playSound crafting/speak Abigail "Hey, watch my fingers!$a"/playSound hitEnemy/pause 200/playSound fishSlap/pause 200/playSound crafting/speak Sam "Okay, perfect!$h"/speak Abigail "Let's head to Seb's house."/changeLocation Mountain/viewport -2000 -2000/warp farmer 5 23 2/faceDirection farmer 2/warp Abigail 5 24 2/warp Sam 5 25 2/warp Caroline 1000 1000/viewport 12 24/playMusic winter_day_ambient/pause 3000/speak Abigail "Okay, are you ready?"/emote farmer 56/pause 1000/textAboveHead Sam "Let's go!"/pause 2000/move Sam 0 2 1/playSound doorClose/warp Sebastian 12 26 2/faceDirection Sebastian 2 true/pause 200/jump Sam/move Sam 0 -2 2/emote Abigail 16/pause 200/speak Sebastian "*sigh*... I'm glad I never have to talk to that client again.$a"/pause 200/move Sebastian 0 3 1/move Sebastian 22 0 1 true/emote Sam 28/pause 1000/speak Sam "That was way too close...$s"/pause 1000/playSound doorClose/warp Maru 12 26 2/pause 1000/move Maru -7 0 0 true/pause 1000/speak Maru "It's about time you got here.$h#$b#Come on in before he comes back."/speak Sam "Heh, thanks, Maru.$3"/pause 500/fade/playSound doorClose/viewport -2000 -2000/stopMusic/changeLocation ScienceHouse/warp farmer 6 21 2/warp Abigail 5 22 1/warp Maru 6 23 0/warp Sam 7 22 3/viewport 6 21/faceDirection farmer 2/pause 1000/speak Maru "I'll keep an eye on him. When I knock on his door, it means he's on the way back."/speak Abigail "Gotcha."/textAboveHead Maru "Good luck!"/pause 500/move Maru 0 1 2/warp Maru 998 998/playSound doorClose/pause 1000/speak Sam "Well, let's set it up."/fade/viewport -2000 -2000/changeLocation SebastianRoom/speak Abigail "Remember to start from the corners and work your way in..."/warp farmer 2 7 0/warp Abigail 1 7 0/warp Sam 300/playSound woodyStep/speak Sam "Here he comes!$3"/doAction 1 3/warp Sebastian 1 3 2/faceDirection Sebastian 2/playSound doorClose/pause 500/playSound openBox/viewport 6 6/playMusic poppy/pause 1000/jump farmer/jump Abigail/jump Sam/textAboveHead Abigail "Suprise!"/textAboveHead Sam "Suprise!"/pause 3000/emote Sebastian 16/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 700/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 700/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 2/move Sebastian 0 1 2/pause 500/speak Sebastian "What..?"/speak Sam "Happy birthday, Seb!$h"/speak Abigail "Hope we didn't go overboard with the sashimi.$h"/pause 2000/speak Sebastian "...You guys are the worst.$h"/speak Sam "Aw, but you love us anyway.$3"/emote Sebastian 40/speak Sebastian "...Yeah, I guess I do.$l"/speak Abigail "...And you love us so much that you'll take us out on bike rides every day for a month?"/speak Sebastian "Don't push it.$7"/speak Abigail "It was worth a shot...$9"/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 700/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 700/faceDirection Sebastian 1/pause 700/faceDirection Sebastian 2/pause 700/speak Sebastian "How did you even pull this off?$7"/speak Abigail "You do realize we're friends with the best fisher in town, right?#$b#@ caught this tuna for us!$h"/speak Sam "And Abby and I just followed this tutorial to slice it up.$3#$b#Oh, and Maru snuck us in."/pause 1000/textAboveHead Sebastian "Oh..."/pause 500/faceDirection Sebastian 0/pause 500/shake Sebastian 5000/jump Abigail/speak Abigail "Oh man, are you okay?$7"/speak Sam "Aw, just give him a minute..."/playSound breathout/faceDirection Sebastian 2/textAboveHead Sebastian "Okay. I'm okay."/pause 1000/speak Sebastian "I just... thanks, guys. Really.$l"/speak Sam "Need a tissue?"/emote Sebastian 12/speak Sebastian "No."/speak Abigail "Yeah, yeah, you're too cool to cry in front of your friends.#$b#Now let's eat!$h"/faceDirection Abigail 2/move Sebastian 0 2 2 true/faceDirection Sam 1/faceDirection farmer 2/textAboveHead Abigail "Here, we brought soy sauce..."/pause 1500/globalFade/viewport -1000 -1000/end dialogueWarpOut Sebastian "I still can't believe you all did that for me.$l"
